params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. Resource name of the Memcached instance for which parameter group updates should be applied.

params.name: data.node_ids
params.description: Nodes to which the instance-level parameter group is applied.

params.name: data.apply_all
params.description: Whether to apply instance-level parameter group to all nodes. If set to true, users are restricted from specifying individual nodes, and ApplyParameters updates all nodes within the instance.
